# The most affected country

In this notebook, an analysis will be provide to find which country is the most affected on economy sector due to the pandemic.

Here are some metadata from the dataset:
* CODE = ISO code of the country
* COUNTRY = country name
* DATE = Date of the values
* HDI = Human developement index
* TC = Total cases
* TD = Total deaths
* STI = Stringency Index
* POP = Population
* GDPCAP = Gross domestic product per capita
